levelList.name: Por Toda la Eternidad
levelList.desc:
If the target's Speed is slower than this unit's, deal +(2.5 x (Speed difference))% more damage (max 25%)
[BeforeAttack] At 3+ highest Reson., inflict [Vibration] Potency by highest Reson. (max 5)
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Vibration] and +5 [Vibration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [FusionVibration] into [VibrationContinue]
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Reduce target's Max Speed by half next turn
